title: Samsung Galaxy S24+ Plus Cell Phone, 512GB AI Smartphone, Unlocked Android, 50MP Camera, Fast Processor, Long Battery Life, AMOLED Display, US Version, 2024, Marble Gray
description: Plus-up your day with S24+. Wonder where your favorite influencer got their shoes? Simply Circle to Search

with Google to see where you can buy your own pair. Then, snap a photo to show off your new kicks and elevate your pic from good to great on the S24+. Before you head out in style, call up that new authentic Japanese restaurant to make a reservation and impress the staff as you use Live Translate

to speak their language in real-time. And, with our most powerful processor yet, you can smoothly switch between texting friends, taking photos of your food and searching for your next culinary adventure. Life just got a whole lot easier — and a lot more fun. Epic, just like that.
